assignments.description: Get Benefits detail from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Benefits
assignments.label: Get Benefits

value.stringValue: What are the benefits and values that will be achieved from implementing your idea?

assignments.description: Get Budget details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Budget
assignments.label: Get Budget

value.stringValue: What’s the expected budget range for the initial phase?

assignments.description: Get Business Sector details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Business_Sector
assignments.label: Get Business Sector

value.stringValue: Which business sector best fits? (CPS; CE; Group; Tech Ops; AI&PO, Other)

assignments.description: Get Core Features detail from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Core_Features
assignments.label: Get Core Features

value.stringValue: What is the core features, functionalities or components of your idea?

assignments.description: Get Deadline details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Deadline
assignments.label: Get Deadline

value.stringValue: Is there any specific deadlines that this needs to be live by? If so, what is the deadlines and what are the reasons for them?

assignments.description: Get Estimated Effort details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Estimated_Effort
assignments.label: Get Estimated Effort

value.stringValue: What is the estimated revenue impact over the next 12 months? Please provide enough facts, figures and detail as to how you arrived at this answer.

assignments.description: Get External Target Audience details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_External_Target_Audience
assignments.label: Get External Target Audience

value.stringValue: Who is the initial External client your Idea is aimed at?

assignments.description: Get Margin Improvement details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Margin_Improvement
assignments.label: Get Margin Improvement

value.stringValue: What is the estimated cost reduction?

assignments.description: Get Metric details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Metrics
assignments.label: Get Metrics

value.stringValue: What are the key success metrics of your idea?

assignments.description: Get Paint Points from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Paint_Points
assignments.label: Get Paint Points

value.stringValue: What are the pain points, problems or challenges you’re trying to solve?

assignments.description: Get Primary Outcomes details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Primary_Outcomes
assignments.label: Get Primary Outcomes

value.stringValue: What are the business outcomes of your idea (Increase Revenue; Reduce Costs; Other)?

assignments.description: Get Revenue Impact details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Revenue_Impact
assignments.label: Get Revenue Impact

value.stringValue: What is the estimated revenue impact over the next 12 months?

assignments.description: Get Summary detail from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Summary
assignments.label: Get Summary

value.stringValue: Please provide comprehensive details about your idea.

assignments.description: Get Target Audience details from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Target_Audience
assignments.label: Get Target Audience

value.stringValue: Is the intended audience of your idea internal or external to Salesforce (Internal, External, Other)?

assignments.description: Get Technology, tool or platform preferences from the User for their Idea.
assignments.name: Get_Technology
assignments.label: Get Technology

value.stringValue: Do you have any technology, tools or platform preferences for your idea?
